entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
